name: part_008
file: tmp_【＃不知火フレア生誕祭 】3D Singing Live！誕生日だし一緒に盛り上がろう！ 【ホロライブ⧸不知火フレア】 [_rJhAn6ZPuU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Shiranui Flare introduces the next song.
Performance of the song 'Wind Climbing ~Kaze ni Asobarete~'.
Post-performance MC; Shiranui Flare is out of breath and drinks water.

subtitles.original: 元々なんか歌いたい曲だったんですけど
subtitles.english: It was a song I've wanted to sing for a while,

subtitles.original: ちょっと歌わせていただいても...
subtitles.english: so if you don't mind me singing it...

subtitles.original: 自分、歌わせていただいてもいいですか？
subtitles.english: May I? Is it okay if I sing it?

subtitles.original: ツイートよろしくね。あ、ちょっ、ツイートよろしくね。
subtitles.english: Please tweet about it! Oh, wait, please tweet about it!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでですね、では、歌わせていただきたいと思います。
subtitles.english: Alright then, I'd like to perform the song now.

subtitles.original: Wind Climbing ~風にあそばれて~
subtitles.english: Wind Climbing ~Played by the Wind~

subtitles.original:
Wind Climbing ～風にあそばれて～
作詞・作曲：奥井亜紀
subtitles.english:
Wind Climbing ~Played by the Wind~
Lyrics & Composition: Maki Okui

subtitles.original: 誕生日を迎えるたびに
subtitles.english: Every time my birthday comes around,

subtitles.original: 何を祝うのかがずっと謎だった
subtitles.english: I always wondered what exactly we were celebrating.

subtitles.original: 見えなくなってしまったものは
subtitles.english: The things that have faded from sight,

subtitles.original: 二度と帰らないと知ったとき
subtitles.english: When I realized they'd never come back,

subtitles.original: 年をとることへの後悔と
subtitles.english: I felt a sense of regret for aging,

subtitles.original: 一日が過ぎていく恐怖を感じた
subtitles.english: And a fear of the passing days.

subtitles.original: どうにもならない今日だけど Hey!
subtitles.english: Today may be beyond my control, but Hey!

subtitles.original: そんな道じゃきっとつまらない
subtitles.english: A path like that would surely be boring.

subtitles.original: 君と生きてく明日だから Hey!
subtitles.english: Because tomorrow is a day I'll live with you, Hey!

subtitles.original: 這い上がるくらいでちょうどいい
subtitles.english: Struggling to climb back up is just about right.

subtitles.original: 脇道を一人歩くそんな自分に
subtitles.english: Walking down a side road all by myself,

subtitles.original: 見惚れてみたり
subtitles.english: I catch myself being captivated by that version of me.

subtitles.original: 歩き疲れた人へと
subtitles.english: To those who have grown weary of walking,

subtitles.original: 冷たい言葉を平気で放つ
subtitles.english: I would casually toss out cold, unfeeling words.

subtitles.original: 調子づいてた小さな自分
subtitles.english: I was just a small person, getting carried away with myself.

subtitles.original: 風にあそばれてやっとここに
subtitles.english: Played by the wind, I finally managed...

subtitles.original: 立っていた
subtitles.english: ...to stand right here.

subtitles.original: どうにもならない今日だけど Hey!
subtitles.english: Today may be beyond my control, but Hey!

subtitles.original: そんな道じゃきっとつまらない
subtitles.english: A path like that would surely be boring.

subtitles.original: 君と生きてく明日だから Hey!
subtitles.english: Because tomorrow is a day I'll live with you, Hey!

subtitles.original: 這い上がるくらいでちょうどいい
subtitles.english: Struggling to climb back up is just about right.

subtitles.original: 今日はお祝いに来てくれてどうもありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you all so much for coming to celebrate today!

subtitles.original: 誕生日を盛り上げるためにみんなも一緒に
subtitles.english: To liven up this birthday celebration, I'd love it if everyone

subtitles.original: 最後まで盛り上がってくれると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: could keep the energy up with me until the very end!

subtitles.original: 手拍子！
subtitles.english: Clap your hands!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 転んでできた傷の痛みに
subtitles.english: For the pain of the wounds from falling,

subtitles.original: 見合う何かを求めたなら
subtitles.english: If I sought something of equal value,

subtitles.original: まぼろし
subtitles.english: It would only be an illusion.

subtitles.original: どうにもならない今日はせめて
subtitles.english: Since there's nothing I can do about today, at least

subtitles.original: 笑い話に変えられますように
subtitles.english: I hope I can turn it into a funny story.

subtitles.original: 君と生きてく明日だから Hey!
subtitles.english: Because tomorrow is a day I'll live with you, Hey!

subtitles.original: 這い上がるくらいでちょうどいい
subtitles.english: Struggling to climb back up is just about right.

subtitles.original: どうにもならない今日だけど Hey!
subtitles.english: Today may be beyond my control, but Hey!

subtitles.original: そんな道じゃきっとつまらない
subtitles.english: A path like that would surely be boring.

subtitles.original: 君と生きてく明日だから Hey!
subtitles.english: Because tomorrow is a day I'll live with you, Hey!

subtitles.original: 這い上がるくらいでちょうどいい
subtitles.english: Struggling to climb back up is just about right.
Phew...

subtitles.original: やっぱ、歌うときにさ...
subtitles.english: You know, when I'm singing...

subtitles.original: はぁはぁって言ってるのをさ、ちょっと、あんまり出したくないなと思ってさ
subtitles.english: I didn't really want to let all that heavy breathing show.

subtitles.original: お水ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for the water.

subtitles.original: 思って頑張るんだけどさ、終わった瞬間にどっと...
subtitles.english: I try my best, but as soon as the song ends, it all hits me...

subtitles.original: ちょっと、お水飲みますね。
subtitles.english: I'm going to drink some water for a second.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.
